channel.title: [Pi] People Can't Connect to my server [Pi]
channel.description:
Hello Ive ran many servers before but have never encountered this problem until now ! NOONE CAN CONNECT TO MY SERVER EXCEPT ME D: Ive checkec over my Client.Java in my client like 200 times. Can someone help me .
If anyone here can help I can send them a copy of the client file

item.title: [Pi] People Can't Connect to my server [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

wurz1l:

make sure the ip matches from www.whatsmyip.org and in your client file, also make sure you have the ports open that you are using for your server

Thats the problem My ports wont open D: And I can’t get them to open I’ve tryed every tut and still have the same end result.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi] People Can't Connect to my server [Pi]
